channel.title: More advance droprates?
channel.description:
I this is an idea i had while i was gething high and talking about runescape cuz i just got my server online yesterday.
Heres the idea: ok i found out that even when you set the drop rates for lets say bgsby graador at 1 on 100 and when the boss dosent drop much other items. it drop the rare items more often.. so i was wondering what if we add more money but put the drop rate lower . u guyz think the rare items will drop more rarely so we could keep a steady eco? sorry if its not strured rigth im stoned atm :) please comment.

item.title: More advance droprates?
item.dc:creator: @Potzon Potzon
item.description:
@Potzon wrote:

uhm… I didn’t understand that much.
If you want better, or more rare droprate, then it’s just to change the 1:100 to 1:250 or something :o
^ That’s what you mean?

Read full topic
